explains: adj. 滞销的；动作缓慢的

sentences.en: She could drive unimpeded by slow-moving traffic.
sentences.cn: 她可以不受影响地在缓慢的车流里行驶。

sentences.en: He was stuck in a line of slow-moving traffic.
sentences.cn: 他堵在缓缓移动的车流里了。

sentences.en: The dusky salamander lives only in slow-moving streams where organic debris settles and accumulates.
sentences.cn: 灰蝾螈只生活在缓慢流动的溪流中，有机碎片在此沉淀堆积。
